body.name: BLACK+DECKER Range Microwave with Top Mount Air Recirculation Vent, 1.6-Cu. Ft. 1000-Watt, Incandescent Lighting, Safety Lock, 15"D x 30"W x 16"H, White

features: Efficient & Effective - 1000 watts of cooking power and a 10 different power levels for boiling, reheating, and defrosting
Press N' Go - One touch cooking programs allow you to easily cook your favorite foods fast edit
Incandescent Lighting - Above-the-range light illuminates cooking space for optimal preparation
Vent System - Control air quality by exhausting smoke, steam, and odors from your cooktop
Modern Controls - Featuring a clean LED display to compliment any kitchen
Safety Lock - Lock the control panel to prevent accidental use or access by children
Quickly defrost your frozen goods to get them to the perfect temperature
body.description: Get your favorite foods cooked easily and conveniently in this over the range Black & Decker 1.6 Cu. Ft. Microwave. This sleek and efficient appliance has 1000 watts of cooking power. Featuring a modest white finish, this unit has 10 different power levels to fulfill all of your cooking desires. When you want to have something ready to eat fast, the 30 second express cooking mode ensures to cook your meal in a snap. The LED display is bright and easy to read, along with the handy kitchen timer and clock for simple meal planning. The glass turntable is smooth and easy to clean, plus it rotates for optimal cooking. This over the range microwave is a smart and efficient choice for the style and feel of your kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great over the range microwave
reviews.reviewText: This microwave was easy enough to install. I did it with the help of my 95lb wife. People who gave it a bad review most likely do not have it level. One reviewer says their door is crooked, most certainly, the microwave is cooked on the wall and causing the door to look funny. Vent hood works great. Microwave cooks food wonderfully. I like that the lights on the bottom are on each end of the microwave vs both lights being centered like my sisters. If you don't have a drill and some kind of saw to cut the hole in the bottom of your cabinet for it to vent up and out or vent out your wall, then don't attempt to install yourself. If you are NOT handy, don't attempt to install yourself. The instructions are LONG and DETAILED. You can't skip through, or you'll have to take it off the wall and put it back on like I did, because you have to take apart a piece on the top/back for the microwave to vent the direction you intend (out the front in your face is how it comes out of box, I had to spin for the vent to blow out of the top, you also have to spin off you want it to blow out the back and through a vent in your wall).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had my old microwave for 23 years. It was damaged when we had a power outage and the surge, when it came back on, blew something inside. I had to replace it. I went online to try to find another white microwave. This is the only white one I could find. B & D has an excellent reputation so I wasn’t worried about purchasing it. However, in comparison with my old Kenmore, the door feels flimsy and the down lights are not as bright, but it does an excellent job of heating food and that’s why I like it. It’s cheaper to buy than most microwaves listed. I’m definitely glad I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great replacement for the microwave we had which stopped working! It vents to the outside, with the lights and exhaust inlets on the underneath like the GE we had.. Very good buy, same power level. We missed the convenience of a microwave! Had to have two people to install which I found on the Nextdoor app.. so far we’re loving it! We’ve had it only for a week now but excellent so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large microwave, cheaper with a better quality
reviews.reviewText: I like the range light that this emits which is significantly better than my old microwave. It has enough area to microwave larger things and it has a good balance of express cook options. I was pleasantly surprised since it’s cost was on the lower end proving that spending less isn’t always a sacrifice on quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product arrived damaged and also delivered the wrong color

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: However I wonder if it could be made to be louder than what it already is. The way it is, it only wakes up the the household & neighbors when using. I would like it to get the whole community up & moving when I open & shut the door & when it beeps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Yup, its a microwave.
reviews.reviewText: ... for the price, this is junk ... the door closes very loudly, almost like its being slammed. The exhaust fan is very weak. If youre cooking under the microwave, the door window fogs up bwteen the panes and cannot be wiped off, you must wait for it to dissipate on its own. The door didnt line up properly, and kind of tilts downward towards the handle, and if its lifted to line up, the microwave turns on all by itself. Just more proof that the products made now-a-days are just junk ... overall, this microwave feels more like a kiddie toy than a 300+ dollar kitchen utilitity.
